Title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
Writer: Guillermo del Toro (screenplay), Guillermo del Toro (story), Mike Mignola (story), Mike Mignola (comic book)
Actors: Ron Perlman, Selma Blair, Doug Jones, John Alexander
Plot: A prince of the mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth, and Hellboy his team must fight to stop him from locating the all-powerful Golden Army.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 29 nominations.
